| History                 = Captain [[Simon Savage (Earth-616)|Simon Savage]], a navy submarine commander, was transferred to the [[United States Marine Corps (Earth-616)|Marines]] during World War II. Savage was said to have modeled his unit on the [[Howling Commandos (WWII) (Earth-616)|Howling Commandos]]. The Leatherneck Raiders specialized in fighting the Japanese, although at least once they teamed up with the Japanese [[Samurai Squadron (Earth-616)|Samurai Squadron]] to fight [[Wolfgang von Strucker (Earth-616)|Baron Strucker]] and [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]].

Although the Leatherneck Raiders (also known as the "Battlefield Raiders") were an effective fighting force in World War II, they never achieved the recognition that the Howling Commandos received.
